name: a99-rigel
description: A public health survey web application

scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && npm test" "cd server && npm test" && exit 0
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && node server.js"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install --save --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../
scripts.startall: npm install && cd client && npm install --save --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../ && concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && node server.js"

author: Rishab, Max, Peter, James
